intro: I am an Frontend Web Developer who works with React,NextJS and Vue.
I am currently a final year student in college who also loves listening audiobooks, learning languages and sketching when free.
plants: Here are my two plants which I am currently taking care of.
I like planting, because it really show how something so small can become so big over time.
sketch: I believe that coding is somewhere similar to sketching
It requires patience to create a detailed drawing, and more in depth you go the more details there are.
audioBooks: AudioBooks I am currently listening to:
